title: Caitlyn
body: i need help for how to be a good Caitlyn. i normaly run Talisman of Ascenion, Runaan's Hurricane, Rapid Fire Cannon, and Nashor's Tooth or Trinity Force. this is at end game. any tips for items, how to use my abilitys, and tip videos will be greatly appreciated, thank you!

replies.body:
I..

Is this a joke?

Oh, lv14.. Lol. I am still almost totally sure this is a troll, nobody could be confused enough to build AP/support items on caitlyn...
Assuming this is actually serious, never get runaans as a first item, AS/crit is a damage multiplier, you need flat damage first.
Use common sense and math.

ok, for one, i said that that was my END GAME build, not my start build. the first item i get is {{item:3301}} . it helps me get a lot of gold early game. i also call my self "the worst gamer" so why do you think i came to the LOL fourms, for help.

You are doing something really wrong if buying a support item is giving you gold. Like not farming at all..

The only item you should ever start on any AD champion is doran's blade, basically no exceptions i can think of.

on bot you shouldn't be taking nashors or talisman, being that talisman is a support items and nashors is an ap item while oyu are the 
adc(attack damage (AD) carry) idk about triforce also, I don't main adc, nor do I play Caitlyn, but this is my 2 cents
I heard crit cait is a thing.
just searched it up. this is what I found: http://www.mobafire.com/league-of-legends/build/caitlyn-adc-build-6-21-423578

build 
{{item:3085}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3036}} {{item:3026}} 
depending on the game.
IDK about mechanics.
less attack speed more attack damage
